## Figures

The figure sizes have been customised so that you can easily put two images side-by-side. 

```{r, fig.show='hold'}
library("aire.zmvm")
library("dplyr")
library("lubridate")
#library("seasonal")


years <- 2010:2016
pm_10 <- get_station_data("MAXIMOS", "pm10", years) 
pm10_m <- pm_10 %>%
  group_by(month(date), year(date)) %>%
  summarise(max = median(value, na.rm = TRUE))


pm10 <- ts(pm10_m$max, start = years[1], freq = 12)
```
